document_data.caption: A map showing Aveen Street and surroundings in the North Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Aveen Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Aveen Street''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Aveen Street was located in the southern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. The road ran in a straight line diagonally between [[Shando Street]] in the southwest and [[Gelthoon Street]] to the northeast. Several small unnamed alleys branched off both sides of Aveen Street.
